thread.title: Sharib and Toshi are back with a bang with 'Sharabi'
thread.title_full: Sharib and Toshi are back with a bang with 'Sharabi' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Sharib and Toshi are back with a bang with 'Sharabi'
text:
Melody makers Sharib and Toshi, are no ordinary twosome. And these days they seem to be on a roll with six major hits back to back with 'Kabhi jo badal barse,' 'Main tenu Samjhawan,' 'Saturday saturday,' 'Saason ko jeene ka sahara,' 'Tu zaruri hai mujhe' and the latest sensation 'Sharabi' becoming one the biggest chartbusters of the season.
READ: Music composers Sharib-Toshi become judges
While ' Samjhawan ' and ' Kabhi jo badal barse ' are heart-touching soulful tunes, 'Saturday' and 'Sharabi' are numbers you can't resist shaking a leg to. And this shows what a versatile music composers this music duo is.
For latest Music updates follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
While they have been popular for their romantic songs, they have also stomped their authority with party numbers. Sharib and Toshi have individually sung super hit numbers, but this is the first time that they have sung a party song together and it's become a rage amongst the youth.
Listen to the songs of Sharib and Toshi on Gaana.com
But not just that, the duo is much in demand when it comes to live performances at lavish Indian weddings, corporate events and musical evenings keeping the energetic performances they give on stage. And they have a jam-packed calendar till the coming year. "We recently performed at the biggest nine-day Navratri event in Surat, leaving the Surtis completely spellbound. It's great to know that we have such a huge fan following," says Toshi Sabri who is a heartthrob of millions and a favourite among Bollywood biggies.
